title: so i asked my girlfriend to draw my favorite champ/skin.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
what do you guys think : D






(edit) thanks for all the nice comments, she never thought it was any good her self so i thought i might see how other people take it

replies.body:
League players can get girlfriends? Huh... 

Nice artwork
Only casual players who have life outside of League can
all i do is play league : D

I rarely play league and I still don't got one!




maybe thats cause I don't like women.... huh
try maining taric

I hate you.

(but It's great)
{{champion:39}} ?
{{champion:67}} Arclight skin

Drawn by your left or right hand?.... 

I'll see myself out.

(Nice work though, take my up vote! ;))
it's a good drawing, but you don't have to feel the need to lie to us like that.  Tell your right hand, she did a good job. ;)
Oh my god this fits so well.
If she didn't think that was good, I'd like to see some drawings she think is great.

Needs more flowy things, maybe some streamers?

(just a joke, it looks great)

http://68.media.tumblr.com/afde722cdb2a5c235e234e21c21222f3/tumblr_nye9dtxpYY1qbsq75o2_1280.jpg

Who dat?

The art itself is really good, though.
it's Arclight Vayne.
good work :3
I think it's time to steal a girl.
pls dont steal me :(
It's a beautiful drawing of Arclight Vayne.  Cancer champ to main though.  Then again, I main Gnar so I don't really have the moral high ground here...
pretty sure I've got you all beat when it comes to having morals
Darius is very dirty, but as a Gnar main I don't really mind him that much.  TBH I hate playing as him and just getting kited all day more.
I've never had a problem against gnars every one I've faced hasn't been that much of a challenge
Atleast Arclight skins are all nice and pretty :D
can your gf tell us how/ with which tools she draw this? not a fan of vayne but the painting looks great tbh.
I usually use a wacom tablet to draw with and the program I use is Paint Tool SAI :^)
oh, thank u for response, my fair lady. :3

my gf is really good at using photoshop and i am no match for her since i don't use it. So i prove to her i can do just as cool like hers using paint. 

i work hard  for this and made a jhin portrait 

> http://imgur.com/a/Uuos1

she love it and i am the happiest man in the world {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Who did you ask again?

Nice drawing skills.
is that {{champion:3}} rework?
yes
If you don't make her draw {{champion:254}} I will hate you for all eternity.
that's awesome
I think youre a scumbag for vayne being your favorite champion
Makes me want to play vayne

i would only try to play vayne if i would get this overpriced soulstealer skin. 
https://media.giphy.com/media/JsSK6zuq3AOCQ/giphy.gif
Wonderful drawing g/f of AAC. ^-^

At first I thought it was a Star Guardian Vayne and I was like YOU KEEP THAT BITCH OUT OF MY SKIN LINE!!!!
Then i was like wait no its Arclight oh lol

Amazing piece tho she's got the skills! Comissions open anytime soon? :D
can you ask her to do jinx, but give her tits
Chun li x Vayne
#SAVINGTHIS
That's a good image of vayne.
Mildly curious what's holding the big crossbow in place. Good drawing though
nice vayne but i hate the champ.
